segments.text: Oh dear , my weight has gone up again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not surprised , you eat too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I suppose sitting at the desk all day at the office doesn't help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do wish I could lose weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , why don't you go on a diet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've tried diets before but they've never worked .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you should excercise more . Why don't you go to an exercise class .
segments.speaker: S2
